channel.title: Open RFC for BIM
channel.description: Recent content on Open RFC for BIM

item.title: <DRAFT> Freemium pricing model for BIM software license
item.description: A proposal to introduce a freemium pricing model to the BIM software like modern SAASs to attract wider audiences to not only use the software but also for allowing more software developers to access SDKs more openly.

Definining Section To define a section: # NAME OF SECTION --- Text Styling Italic Bold Bold Italic The world is flat. We now know that the world is round. Number List first nested-1 nested-2 second third Bullet Point Unsorted list nested list-1 nested list-2 bullet Inserting Table Syntax Description Header Title Paragraph Text Inserting Link You can put link like this: link here. Inserting Code { "firstName": "John", "lastName": "Smith", "age": 25 }

item.title: Human friendly naming conventions in BIM
item.description: This is a minimum tempalte for all new RFCs, duplicate this markdown file (.md) to start writing up your RFC!

item.title: RFC Process
item.description: A general guideline for wiring up new RFC and also sets the process from initiatination to the acceptance of a new RFC on the platform as well as its lifecycle.

item.title: RFC template
item.description: This is a minimum template for all new RFCs, duplicate this markdown file (.md) to start writing up your RFC!
